welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nkowakowa, South Africa! Get ready to experience the warm hospitality and vibrant culture of this charming city. Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy everything Nkowakowa has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Letaba Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Letaba Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Polokwane Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Polokwane Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.
